article_title: FTC Kicks Marketer To Curb In Insurance Scam Settlement
article_text:
FTC Kicks Marketer To Curb In Insurance Scam Settlement

Law360, New York (November 13, 2015, 8:20 PM ET) -- The Federal Trade Commission announced a settlement Friday with a Florida company accused of passing medical discount cards off as health insurance, obtaining promises from the company that it will no longer market health care products in exchange for the government’s agreement to drop a federal fraud suit.
